"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

oh yea, how can i forgot this one... when i got online on The Tribunal... i got onto a chat with a GM for quite awhile... conclusion is that YOU CANNOT CHANGE SERVER. it is only a RUMOR. changing name is possible as i did from Isaac to Freed in that server. i also dunno y... but what the heck...Freedp/s: too bad Fred or Fredd wont work :(--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
